DOC.detailed_description: Late onset Hypothyroidism find infant congenital hypothyroidism . The hypothesis infant congenital hypothyroidism may lose thyroxin hormone via chylothorax fluid cause transient hypothyroidism . In study hormonal concentration measure chyle well hormonal serum level .
DOC.criteria: Infants congenital chylothorax require thorax drain
